<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
CRYPTO
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/12/17/coinbase-go-public-major-boost-crypto?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Coinbase Jumps Into the Public Market
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Coinbase at the New York Stock Exchange " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zNDU3L2NvaW5iYXNlX2lwby5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Well, pretty soon. Yesterday, crypto exchange Coinbase <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/12/17/largest-us-cryptocurrency-exchange-coinbase-files-for-ipo-as-bitcoin-soars-past-23000.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">filed paperwork</a> with the SEC to go public. It's likely to be one of the first big IPOs of 2021. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The rundown:</strong> Coinbase was founded in 2012 by Brian Armstrong and Fred Ehrsam, and has since grown from a bitcoin exchange into one of the foremost crypto companies. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Armstrong incited controversy earlier this year when he </span><span><a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/09/30/election-day-approaches-companies-wrestle-policies-political-discussions?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">explained</a></span><span> in a blog post that Coinbase was a strictly apolitical company and offered buyouts to any employees who disagreed. Sixty took him up on it. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Run the numbers: </strong>Coinbase <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/bitcoin-exchange-coinbase-files-for-initial-public-offering-11608232520?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">has raised</a> over $547 million from investors including Andreessen Horowitz, Union Square, and BBVA. It was most recently valued at about $8 billion and boasts about 35 million users, more than Schwab. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">This is really a story about crypto's glow-up </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Cryptocurrencies were once the Gunther of the financial world because of their volatility and murky-at-best legal status. But this year, they're <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/12/17/largest-us-cryptocurrency-exchange-coinbase-files-for-ipo-as-bitcoin-soars-past-23000.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">approaching</a> Phoebe (irrefutably the best cast member). </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Bitcoin, the largest cryptocurrency, is up over 200% on the year. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Just this week, it surpassed $20,000 for the first time ever on its way up to $23k.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Bitcoin's price is surging as more Patagonia vests embrace crypto. Traditional investors such as Paul Tudor Jones and Stanley Druckenmiller have come out in favor of bitcoin. Institutional investors Fidelity and MassMutual have also gotten on board, and financial platforms Square and Robinhood now allow crypto trading. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">There are a couple major unknowns </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Coinbase hasn’t <a href="https://fortune.com/2020/12/17/coinbase-ipo-cryptocurrency-initial-public-offering-stock/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">announced</a> 1) which exchange it will list on or 2) how the IPO will be structured. We could even see a blockchain-based IPO—if the SEC is in the mood to approve that sort of thing. If not, Coinbase could follow Spotify and Slack's path to a direct listing. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>If you've ever hung out with crypto folks, you know they're the people at the bar who order a round of French 75s. Coinbase's IPO will not be typical.  </p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
E-COMMERCE
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/12/17/walmart-debut-shoppable-tiktok-content?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Walmart and TikTok: On Again
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>

<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="South Park character saying "we're back together"" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=377 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/l0HlTQ7X0tigs8vJu/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="South Park character saying " we're back together"" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/l0HlTQ7X0tigs8vJu/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In September, <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/retail/stories/2020/09/21/walmart-secures-investment-tiktok?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">news broke</a> that Walmart planned to invest in the imperiled social media giant TikTok. It didn't make <em>no</em> sense—TikTok faced a ban from the U.S. unless it found an American buyer, and an investment would give Walmart an intro to its young and choreographically talented user base—but it seemed like an odd couple. What's next, Sam's Club x Twitch? </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Nope, what's next is more Walmart x TikTok. The TikTok ban is still in legal limbo, but today, Walmart <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/12/17/walmart-is-bringing-livestream-shopping-to-tiktok-on-friday.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">will test out</a> a pilot version of shoppable content on the platform. How it works: </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Ten of the biggest TikTok creators, including Michael Le and Taylor Hage, will display Walmart's fashion items in a livestream on its profile. During their displays, pins </span><span><a href="https://techcrunch.com/2020/12/17/walmart-to-pilot-test-live-streamed-video-shopping-on-tiktok/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">will pop up</a></span><span> for users to click on and add to their carts. </span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Online shoppers can also browse all the featured items after the event. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>Big Tech behemoths including Facebook, Google, and Amazon have tried to integrate social media and shopping, but no one's quite cracked the nut, at least not in the U.S. </p>

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
PUBLIC HEALTH
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/12/17/swedish-king-says-country-failed-pandemic-response?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
The King's Speech
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="A photograph of King Carl XVI Gustaf seated at a desk signing papers. He is wearing a black suit with a tie and glasses." style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zNDU5L2tpbmdfY2FybF94dmlfZ3VzdGFmLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em><em>Kungahuset</em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Yesterday, Sweden's King Carl XVI Gustaf <a href="https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-55347021?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">said</a> his country "failed" its pandemic response. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Refresher: </strong>While other countries enacted strict lockdowns when the pandemic began, Sweden gambled on an open economy and voluntary guidelines, with the goal of eventually reaching herd immunity. The reality:</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Sweden's economy shrank 8.5% in the first half of the year. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>It's logged 350,000 cases and 7,800+ deaths (more than its Nordic neighbors combined). On Monday, a government report said officials failed to protect nursing home residents, who account for nearly half of Covid-related deaths in Sweden.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Hospitals are overwhelmed and healthcare worker resignations are rising. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Anders Tegnell, Sweden's Dr. Fauci, </span><span><a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/swedens-covid-19-policy-comes-under-fresh-scrutiny-11608145710?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">admitted</a></span><span> there are "no signs of immunity in the population that are slowing down the infection."</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">While Tegnell has <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-12-17/sweden-s-top-covid-strategist-is-losing-the-population-s-trust?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">defended</a> his approach, a second wave of cases this fall forced Sweden to change its tack. In the last month, it’s banned gatherings larger than eight, stopped late-night alcohol sales, and moved some high schools to remote learning.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>EU regulators should release a decision on the Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine Monday. If it's approved, Swedish healthcare workers get dibs around Christmas. </p>

<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/12/17/mortgage-rates-hit-15th-record-low-year?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">

</h1>

<img alt="Housing market " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zMTc5L2hvdXNpbmdfbWFya2V0LmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 1.38;"><span style="text-decoration: none;">The 30-year fixed-rate mortgage, the most popular long-term commitment after marriage, </span><a href="https://www.cnn.com/2020/12/17/success/mortgage-rates-record-low-december/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">fell to a record low</a><span style="text-decoration: none;"> of 2.67%, according to Freddie Mac. That's 1) the 15th record low this year and 2) the lowest since Freddie started tracking ~50 years ago.</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li dir="ltr" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px;list-style-type: disc; text-decoration: none;">
<span>
</span><span><p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 1.38;"><span style="text-decoration: none;">FYI: </span><span style="text-decoration: none;">Freddie Mac is a government-sponsored mortgage investor. To calculate the average rate, it compiles rates extended to "high-quality" borrowers by 80 lenders across the country.</span></p></span><span>
</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 1.38;"><span style="text-decoration: none;">Bargain basement rates have pushed folks who might otherwise have held off a few years into the homebuying ring. Compared to 2019, mortgage applications are up 26% and refinances 105%, per the Mortgage Bankers Association.</span></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 1.38;"><span style="text-decoration: none;">Economists expect that momentum to continue into 2021, especially after the Fed recommitted Wednesday to its bond-buying program (which includes mortgage-backed securities that have helped keep rates down). </span></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">While we're here...</strong>amazing news for aspiring Chip and Joanna Gaineses. Returns on home flips are at a <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/12/17/home-flipping-profits-are-the-highest-in-20-years.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">two-decade high</a>, according to ATTOM Data Solutions. But good luck getting your hands on cheap property: Surging home sales have squeezed supply and inflated prices.</p>

style=\"color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;\"\u003e\n\u003cfont color=\"#000000\"\u003e\nCoinbase Jumps Into the Public Market\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"Coinbase at the New York Stock Exchange \" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zNDU3L2NvaW5iYXNlX2lwby5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eFrancis Scialabba\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWell, pretty soon. Yesterday, crypto exchange Coinbase \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/12/17/largest-us-cryptocurrency-exchange-coinbase-files-for-ipo-as-bitcoin-soars-past-23000.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003efiled paperwork\u003c/a\u003e with the SEC to go public. It's likely to be one of the first big IPOs of 2021. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe rundown:\u003c/strong\u003e Coinbase was founded in 2012 by Brian Armstrong and Fred Ehrsam, and has since grown from a bitcoin exchange into one of the foremost crypto companies. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eArmstrong incited controversy earlier this year when he \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/09/30/election-day-approaches-companies-wrestle-policies-political-discussions?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eexplained\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e in a blog post that Coinbase was a strictly apolitical company and offered buyouts to any employees who disagreed. Sixty took him up on it. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eRun the numbers: \u003c/strong\u003eCoinbase \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/bitcoin-exchange-coinbase-files-for-initial-public-offering-11608232520?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ehas raised\u003c/a\u003e over $547 million from investors including Andreessen Horowitz, Union Square, and BBVA. It was most recently valued at about $8 billion and boasts about 35 million users, more than Schwab. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThis is really a story about crypto's glow-up \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eCryptocurrencies were once the Gunther of the financial world because of their volatility and murky-at-best legal status. But this year, they're \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/12/17/largest-us-cryptocurrency-exchange-coinbase-files-for-ipo-as-bitcoin-soars-past-23000.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eapproaching\u003c/a\u003e Phoebe (irrefutably the best cast member). \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eBitcoin, the largest cryptocurrency, is up over 200% on the year. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eJust this week, it surpassed $20,000 for the first time ever on its way up to $23k.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBitcoin's price is surging as more Patagonia vests embrace crypto. Traditional investors such as Paul Tudor Jones and Stanley Druckenmiller have come out in favor of bitcoin. Institutional investors Fidelity and MassMutual have also gotten on board, and financial platforms Square and Robinhood now allow crypto trading. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThere are a couple major unknowns \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eCoinbase hasn’t \u003ca href=\"https://fortune.com/2020/12/17/coinbase-ipo-cryptocurrency-initial-public-offering-stock/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eannounced\u003c/a\u003e 1) which exchange it will list on or 2) how the IPO will be structured. We could even see a blockchain-based IPO—if the SEC is in the mood to approve that sort of thing. If not, Coinbase could follow Spotify and Slack's path to a direct listing. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line: \u003c/strong\u003eIf you've ever hung out with crypto folks, you know they're the people at the bar who order a round of French 75s. Coinbase's IPO will not be typical.  \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIn September, \u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/retail/stories/2020/09/21/walmart-secures-investment-tiktok?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003enews broke\u003c/a\u003e that Walmart planned to invest in the imperiled social media giant TikTok. It didn't make \u003cem\u003eno\u003c/em\u003e sense—TikTok faced a ban from the U.S. unless it found an American buyer, and an investment would give Walmart an intro to its young and choreographically talented user base—but it seemed like an odd couple. What's next, Sam's Club x Twitch? \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eNope, what's next is more Walmart x TikTok. The TikTok ban is still in legal limbo, but today, Walmart \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/12/17/walmart-is-bringing-livestream-shopping-to-tiktok-on-friday.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ewill test out\u003c/a\u003e a pilot version of shoppable content on the platform. How it works: \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eTen of the biggest TikTok creators, including Michael Le and Taylor Hage, will display Walmart's fashion items in a livestream on its profile. During their displays, pins \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://techcrunch.com/2020/12/17/walmart-to-pilot-test-live-streamed-video-shopping-on-tiktok/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ewill pop up\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e for users to click on and add to their carts. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eOnline shoppers can also browse all the featured items after the event. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eBig Tech behemoths including Facebook, Google, and Amazon have tried to integrate social media and shopping, but no one's quite cracked the nut, at least not in the He is wearing a black suit with a tie and glasses.\" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zNDU5L2tpbmdfY2FybF94dmlfZ3VzdGFmLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003e\u003cem\u003eKungahuset\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eYesterday, Sweden's King Carl XVI Gustaf \u003ca href=\"https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-55347021?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esaid\u003c/a\u003e his country \"failed\" its pandemic response. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eRefresher: \u003c/strong\u003eWhile other countries enacted strict lockdowns when the pandemic began, Sweden gambled on an open economy and voluntary guidelines, with the goal of eventually reaching herd immunity. The reality:\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eSweden's economy shrank 8.5% in the first half of the year. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eIt's logged 350,000 cases and 7,800+ deaths (more than its Nordic neighbors combined). On Monday, a government report said officials failed to protect nursing home residents, who account for nearly half of Covid-related deaths in Sweden.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eHospitals are overwhelmed and healthcare worker resignations are rising. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eAnders Tegnell, Sweden's Dr. Fauci, \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/swedens-covid-19-policy-comes-under-fresh-scrutiny-11608145710?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eadmitted\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e there are \"no signs of immunity in the population that are slowing down the infection.\"\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWhile Tegnell has \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-12-17/sweden-s-top-covid-strategist-is-losing-the-population-s-trust?sref=KkPzpZvz\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edefended\u003c/a\u003e his approach, a second wave of cases this fall forced Sweden to change its tack. In the last month, it’s banned gatherings larger than eight, stopped late-night alcohol sales, and moved some high schools to remote learning.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003eEU regulators should release a decision on the Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine Monday. If it's approved, Swedish healthcare workers get dibs around Christmas. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 1.38;\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"text-decoration: none;\"\u003eThe 30-year fixed-rate mortgage, the most popular long-term commitment after marriage, \u003c/span\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2020/12/17/success/mortgage-rates-record-low-december/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003efell to a record low\u003c/a\u003e\u003cspan style=\"text-decoration: none;\"\u003e of 2.67%, according to Freddie Mac. That's 1) the 15th record low this year and 2) the lowest since Freddie started tracking ~50 years ago.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli dir=\"ltr\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px;list-style-type: disc; text-decoration: none;\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\r\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 1.38;\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"text-decoration: none;\"\u003eFYI: \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"text-decoration: none;\"\u003eFreddie Mac is a government-sponsored mortgage investor. To calculate the average rate, it compiles rates extended to \"high-quality\" borrowers by 80 lenders across the country.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\r\n\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 1.38;\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"text-decoration: none;\"\u003eBargain basement rates have pushed folks who might otherwise have held off a few years into the homebuying ring. Compared to 2019, mortgage applications are up 26% and refinances 105%, per the Mortgage Bankers Association.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 1.38;\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"text-decoration: none;\"\u003eEconomists expect that momentum to continue into 2021, especially after the Fed recommitted Wednesday to its bond-buying program (which includes mortgage-backed securities that have helped keep rates down). \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhile we're here...\u003c/strong\u003eamazing news for aspiring Chip and Joanna Gaineses. Returns on home flips are at a \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/12/17/home-flipping-profits-are-the-highest-in-20-years.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003etwo-decade high\u003c/a\u003e, according to ATTOM Data Solutions. But good luck getting your hands on cheap property: Surging home sales have squeezed supply and inflated prices.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\"
